Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided in the given information to directly link the video to bodies being removed from a hospital in Iran during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video shows bodies being removed from a hospital in Iran during the COVID-19 pandemic without providing any concrete evidence or verification.
Exist alternative explanation: The video is found to be a footage of bodies of worshippers who died during Hajj in Saudi Arabia, indicating an alternative explanation for the content of the video.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video actually depicts bodies of worshippers who died during Hajj in Saudi Arabia, rather than bodies being removed from a hospital in Iran during the COVID-19 pandemic.
